Example.Name: Calendar
Example.Description: In this example,we set time the first time(PWRCU_BAKREG_0 is not 0x5A5A),and store the time in backup register PWRCU_BAKREG_1.We also write 0x5A5A(or any value you like) in backup register PWRCU_BAKREG_0 to avoid set time again.It will load the time from this register PWRCU_BAKREG_1 after reset.The led3 blink every second.This code segment suits for ht32f125x serial mcu.
